pullRequest.title: Introduce the quarkus.container-image.image property
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes: #8588
Also, clean up some technical debt related to the container-image extensions.
The handling of the image string and its parts is now much more consistent
between extensions

commit.message:
Introduce the quarkus.container-image.image property

This property is meant to specify the entire image string
as one would use on the docker command line or as is
found in CI systems like GitLab (whose CI_REGISTRY_IMAGE)
was used as a model for this

Fixes: #8588

Make container image extensions consistent in image usage

Use ContainerImageInfoBuildItem wherever possible instead of
using ContainerImageConfig
Use Quarkus version instead of Jib version in metadata

beforeCommit.message: Use Quarkus version instead of Jib version in metadata

afterCommit.message: Use Quarkus version instead of Jib version in metadata

nodes.bodyText: +1 we might want to replace our ImageUtils with that.
